activities.name: Removing Money from the Cash Box

cuepoints.caption: Below the Bar Code Scanner is the Bill Acceptor. Let's talk about how to remove cash from the Bill Acceptor's Cash Box.
As we mentioned previously, the key marked BA is needed in order to access this area.
To open the Bill Acceptor door, insert the BA key into the lock,
and gently pull the door forward.
To remove the Cash Box, simply lift up the blue release button at the rear with one hand
slide the Cash Box toward the back of the Gemini
and gently lift it up and out.
To remove money from the Cash Box, locate the round opening,
push down the blue button to open the door,
then push up the clear stacker and slide the money out.
Now let's re-insert the Cash Box.
Lower the Cash Box back in while pressing it to the rear of the Gemini just as you did when you removed it.
Once it is all the way down, gently pull it forward until it locks into place.
To close the Bill Acceptor compartment, lift up the door, close firmly, turn the key to the left and remove it.
